name: ISBN Match Query
description: Query to find instances with matching ISBN
query: WITH isbn AS (SELECT ie.instance_hrid, ii.identifier, NULLIF(LEFT(RIGHT(REGEXP_REPLACE(ii.identifier, ' .*', ''), 10), 9), ':') AS isbn, ie.title, sm.content AS author FROM folio_derived.instance_ext ie JOIN folio_derived.instance_identifiers ii ON ie.instance_hrid = ii.instance_hrid JOIN folio_source_record.marc__t sm ON ie.instance_hrid = sm.instance_hrid WHERE ii.identifier_type_name = 'ISBN' AND ii.identifier NOT SIMILAR TO '(:|$)%' AND sm.field = '100' AND sm.ord = 1 AND sm.sf = 'a') SELECT l.instance_hrid AS hrid, r.instance_hrid AS hrid2, l.identifier, l.isbn, '"' || REPLACE(l.title, '"', '""') || '"' AS title, '"' || REPLACE(r.title, '"', '""') || '"' AS title2, '"' || REPLACE(l.author, '"', '""') || '"' AS author, '"' || REPLACE(r.author, '"', '""') || '"' AS author2 FROM isbn l JOIN isbn r ON l.isbn = r.isbn AND l.instance_hrid < r.instance_hrid
